name: glob-ghas
description: Globomantics Code Review Assistant - A deliberately vulnerable application for teaching GitHub Advanced Security

scripts.dev: node -e "try { require('child_process').execSync('npx kill-port 3000', {stdio: 'ignore'}); } catch (e) {}" && nodemon src/app.js
scripts.codeql: codeql database create db --language=javascript && codeql database analyze db --format=sarif-latest --output=./codeql-results.sarif
scripts.codeql:custom: codeql database create db --language=javascript && codeql database analyze db ./.github/codeql/javascript-custom-queries.qls --format=sarif-latest --output=./codeql-custom-results.sarif

author: Globomantics Training Team
